Constantinople was made the capital of ALL Rome in 330 and Ravena had remained the capital of WEST Rome since 402, so Rome being the Capital holds no credible argument. When Mehmed II conquered Constantinople, he was declared Kayser-i Rum after he finished the Roman Empire. I use the term Byzantine as convention but it is a timestamp on the same, continuous empire.
